name: ecobee4 Smart Thermostat + Room Sensors, No Hub Required
shortDescription: With built-in Alexa Voice Service, ecobee4 can listen to your voice commands and respond. Have it set a timer, read you the news, adjust the temperature, and more. It also comes with a Room Sensor™ that helps manage hot or cold spots in your home, delivering comfort in the rooms that matter. And because sensors can detect occupancy, they can automatically enable the right mode on your ecobee for energy savings when no one is home.
longDescription: <h2><strong>PROVIDES ALL-AROUND COMFORT</strong></h2><h3>Be comfortable in the rooms that matter.</h3>Most thermostats only read the temperature in one place (usually the hallway) which can make other rooms uncomfortable. ecobee4 comes with a room sensor to help manage hot or cold spots.<br><br> <p>When you place sensors in your favorite rooms, ecobee4 can read the temperature and detect occupancy. That's how it ensures comfort in the rooms that matter.</p><p><br></p><h2><strong>LISTENS AND ANSWERS BACK</strong></h2><h3>Comes with Amazon Alexa Voice Service built inside.</h3>With Amazon Alexa Voice Service built inside, ecobee4 can perform the many 'skills' that come with Alexa. All you have to do is ask, and watch the blue light pipe on top of the thermostat blink in response. For total hands-free control, it can even hear you from across the room.<br><br> <p><br></p><h2><strong>LETS YOU FOCUS</strong></h2><h3>With Alexa, fulfill everyday tasks with a simple command.</h3>Imagine you’re throwing a last-minute dinner party. Simply ask your ecobee4 to walk you through each step out loud – from finding the right recipes to the ideal music playlist.<br><br> <p><br></p><h2><strong>OBSESSIVELY ENGINEERED</strong></h2><h3>Designed to be seen<br> and heard.</h3>ecobee4 has embedded microphones with far-field voice recognition and a speaker engineered for clear voice and full sound. It’s the smart thermostat that looks at home on your wall – that you can hear and speak to from across the room.<br><br> <p><br></p><h2><strong>KEEPS UP WITH YOU</strong></h2><h3>Not at your thermostat? No problem.</h3><br><br> <ul><li>Comfort on the go | Adjust temperature and comfort settings easily from the ecobee mobile app on your Android and iOS devices, including Apple Watch.</li><li>Knows you have a life | Vacationing and forgot to let your ecobee know? Make a vacation event using the ecobee mobile app. If something’s wrong with your equipment, we can send you service alerts and reminders.</li><li>Control the volume | If it's getting a little loud for your taste, you can use the app to adjust the volume.<br><br></li></ul><h2><strong>SAVES YOU ENERGY</strong></h2><h3>Save up to 23%* in heating and cooling costs each year.</h3>Plus, we’re ENERGY STAR® certified, so you know it's good for you and the planet.<br><br> <p><a href="https://www.ecobee.com/savings/">Learn more</a></p><p>Smart Home/Away can automatically enable the right mode for energy savings when it senses no one is home.</p><p>Free energy reports show you how much energy you’ve conserved each month and provide insight into your heating and cooling equipment.</p><p><br></p><h2><strong>SMARTER HOME</strong></h2><h3>Engineered to belong in your home.</h3><br><br> <ul><li>Easy set up | Check your compatibility and install the ecobee yourself. We can connect you with certified pro installers in your area, too.</li><li>Built to last | ecobee thermostats are hardwired, which means your thermostat isn’t relying on a battery or your HVAC equipment to charge itself.</li></ul>
